description.p: Added new layout support for various screen sizes and the ability to duplicate forms. Update also includes various bug fixes.

discussion.p: Added support to display form types that specify multiple columns and other layout options. Added multiple-screen size support to choose the appropriate layout options in the form type for the current device's size and orientation. See [Multiple Screen Size Support].
Added Duplicate Form menu item to Main Control Bar and Form Details menus. It creates a new form that has a copy of all of the field values and media files of the currently selected form.
Added the "Errors during uploading" help section to [Downloading, Refreshing, and Uploading].
Fixed various bugs and other issues.
